actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for portable whirlpool pumps purchased or rented for use in the patient's home pursuant to a physician's prescription.

summary.text: Authorizes payment under the supplementary medical insurance program of title XVIII (Medicare) of for portable whirlpool pumps purchased or rented for use in the patient's home pursuant to a physician's prescription.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for portable whirlpool pumps purchased or rented for use in the patient's home pursuant to a physician's prescription.
